mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mainpage_article1 (writeform1_project_id, article_id, writeform1_form_name, writeform1_content, writeform1_writer, writeform1_regDate, writeform1_file_name, writeform1_img_name) VALUES ( 1, article_seq.nextval, #{writeForm1_form_name}, #{writeForm1_content}, 'tester', sysdate, #{writeForm1_file_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm1_img_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
